name: Naked Puzzle: Girls
description:
"Naked Puzzle: Girls" is an puzzle game, where the goal is to get all the girls undressed.

Match the pieces and unlock new stages. Each level with less and less clothing.

No need to move pieces around, just rotate them! Plow your way trough all the mosaics.



Game Features:

🍑 19 auto generate puzzles.
🍑 6 girls.
🍑 20 achievements.
🍑 Lots of cool backgrounds.
🍑 Navigation that enables close ups.
🍑 Each stage gets more challenging.
🍑 Don't ever get stuck! Use the sneak peak ability to uncover the missing pieces!
🍑 If in a hurry, press Ⓧ.


(The game shows naked breasts and genitals)
